pages.text: If you want to play a song with more than 3 instruments at once, one way to do that is to play with a friend!$(br2)If you link an instrument to your Transmitter it will continue to play notes from your Transmitter even when being used by another player, as long as they are close by.
Other players can also link their instruments to your Transmitter by right-clicking you while holding the instrument that they want to link.
